document.full_text: american hurdler david oliver got his revenge and sprinters steve mullings and carmelita jeter delivered sparkling 100 meters times at a sold-out prefontaine classic meeting on saturday.
document.title: oliver avenges shanghai hurdles loss to liu
lines_and_colors: american hurdler david oliver got his revenge and sprinters steve mullings and carmelita jeter delivered sparkling 100 meters times at a sold-out prefontaine classic meeting on saturday.
